email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is more in line with our expectations. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Let me know if these adjustments are possible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 18-23 October. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $20,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the flexibility on the laycan. We can accept the demurrage terms at $20,000 per day. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $48.50 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap below for your review: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m, Cargo: Crude Oil, Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam, Laycan: 18-23 October, Freight Rate: $48.50 per metric ton, Demurrage: $20,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
